dmca.title: SmartSound complains of cracks
dmca.body:
Dear Legal Support:

It has come to our attention that your forums currently contain a posting of a SmartSound "crack" serial number, which will allow users to "unlock" the demo version of our software and use the full working version of our latest software application without buying a legal copy. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing webpages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

Reporting IP: 67.174.191.203
Abuse: content
Group: alt.cracks.nl
Message:
http://groups.google.com/group/alt.cracks.nl/browse_thread/thread/ed11faab0f526038/b1bb02940d94ade0?q=Sonicfire&rnum=10#b1bb03+5d+5adc0

We hereby request the removal of the forum thread to prevent additional theft of our software application, as these users clearly have done and as other potential thieves could do, should they encounter this thread. I swear, under penalty of perjury consistent with United States Code Title 17, Section 512, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.
[signed]
[private]
Vice President, Operations SmartSound Software
sharon@smartsound.com
818-920-9122
